scripts.build:libs: ng build game-board && ng build game-board-ui
scripts.test:libs: ng test game-board --watch=false && ng test game-board-ui --watch=false
scripts.api-extractor:game-board: tsc -p projects/game-board/tsconfig.api.json --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir dist/types/game-board && api-extractor run --local --config projects/game-board/api-extractor.json
scripts.api-extractor:game-board-ui: tsc -p projects/game-board-ui/tsconfig.api.json --declaration --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir dist/types/game-board-ui && api-extractor run --local --config projects/game-board-ui/api-extractor.json
scripts.api-extractor: npm run api-extractor:game-board && npm run api-extractor:game-board-ui
